title: Integrated Multimedia Production and Instructional Design Project for Strengthening Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Mathematics Teaching Experience and Foundational Instructional Design Knowledge
context.additional_context: Program to Strengthen the Competency of In-Service Mathematics Teachers in Integrating Multimedia Production and Instructional Design in Actual Classroom Settings

learning_goals: Learners can develop a plan to utilize multimedia tools (videos, interactive materials, etc.) for math education content development.
Learners can design multimedia production strategies for math education based on learner analysis results.
Learners can evaluate and improve the quality of math education multimedia resources through collaboration with peer teachers and technical experts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
